pathAssistantSteps.info:
- Begin to build champion's deck and validate core assumptions with champion

- Confirm there are no key blockers (i.e. features, sec, deployment, etc.)

- Identify all key stakeholders needed to a.) formally evaluate Atlan and b.) get final buy-in for the solution and build a plan to engage them prior to POC


EXIT CRITERIA: Decision Process and Criteria, Competition, Compelling Event Champion complete in MEDDICCC. Prospect confirms Evaluation of Atlan in next 60 days.

Write deal summary & append signed contract to opportunity. Must be validated by Sales Ops in order to move to closed-won.


EXIT CRITERIA: Signed Contract. AE completes "why did we win" summary and shares internally

- Create Champion's Deck Demonstrating Value of Atlan

- Present to all key stakeholders needed to get final buy-in for the solution

- Understand prospect's paperwork process and begin shaping close plan


﻿EXIT CRITERIA: Verbal on Atlan solution from all stakeholders & economic buyer. Formal proposal provided.

-Provide formal paperwork to prospect adhering to Atlan's Paperwork Process Doc. 

-Mutual action plan updates with detailed dates, required responsibilities, and all steps mapped out to a signed contract.


﻿EXIT CRITERIA: Customer has agreed in writing to most recent proposal and legal documents delivered by Atlan AE

- Prep Sales Engineering on customer + fill out Solution Session Doc

- Collaboratively complete Solution Session doc with customer and validate all core items with prospect.

- Review Mutual Action Plan and confirm with prospect.


﻿EXIT CRITERIA: Solution session completed where prospect and Atlan aligned on ideal business outcome of problem statements we're solving for. Prospect and Atlan agree to logistics of MAP. MEDDICCC completed

- Outline 3-4 key meetings and next steps with prospect to evaluate solution

- Execute on Value Stream Workshop + End-User / Technical Presentations over course of eval timeframe

- Educate the prospect on core functionality / use cases of the platform

- Educate the prospect on customer success process and how we can make thems successful


﻿EXIT CRITERIA: Technical win: Prospect has determined Atlan meets their required capabilities & would like move forward with commercial discussion.
